replies.message: Hey Anh. You can learn how to get help recovering an old account here: http://bit.ly/1SaAWku. Keep in mind that it's against our Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. -Jordan
Wow! You're making us blush, Abood. Thanks for sharing those kind words. -Jordan

THANKS FOR YOU Facebook I wish that I was working for Facebook team ..
It worked to keep it just like you
I love Face Book..i have met some loving n kind people from all parts of the world..thanks Face Book Team..now let me change my name  lol
Facebook it's too bad they won't help people who are being bullied

Facebook is VERY flawed - admins are either incompetent, racist or... non-existant. When I notified about some racist scum praising Hitler for the holocaust and saying "the only bad thing is he didn't kill all the Jews" and that "the new holocaust should include all those Muslim immigrants" - I got response that it does not violate community standards. However I got punished for calling that person a "racist scum". Go figure...

Facebook Three of us were removed as admins from our website, “The Best of the 1950s” after obtaining over 500,000 members! Yes, we were the largest 50s page on Facebook! A site where members shared their treasured childhood memories with friends and family. We sent numerous reports to Facebook using various venues about being hacked by someone posting nothing but click bait. It has been two weeks and not received a single reply from Facebook about our concerns. Members are confused, frustrated and angry about what’s happening to the page! Please help!
